price: Na mcheni aliye kupeni haya mnayo yajua.
footnotes: Na tahadharini na ghadhabu za Mwenyezi Mungu aliye kukunjulieni neema zake, kwa mnayo yajua yaliyo mbele yenu ya vipawa vyake vya namna mbali mbali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
